name: Form and Excel functions
description: The project is a web application with a main page containing a form (index.html) and a secondary page demonstrating Excel-like functions (excel.html).
techStack: The application is developed using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity and functionality. The JavaScript code, found in script.js, leverages the Document Object Model (DOM) to manipulate webpage elements and handle events, and it also uses Web Storage (localStorage) to save theme preferences.

name: DataDive
description: The application is a web-based area calculator that allows users to compute the area of various geometric shapes (circle, triangle, square, rectangle) and visualizes these shapes using SVG.
techStack: The calculator is built using HTML for structure and uses Bootstrap for styling. The main interactivity and calculations are achieved using embedded JavaScript. Additionally, the application leverages external libraries like jQuery, Bootstrap's JavaScript components, and Math.js for mathematical operations.

name: AutoML
description: An automated machine learning platform for quick model training.
